The 'Russians' (, russkiye) are an East Slavic ethnic group native to
Russia, [http://www.britannica.com/EBchecked/topic/548156/Slav "Slav."]
EncyclopÃ¦dia Britannica Online. 30 July 2011. speaking the Russian
language and primarily living in Russia and neighboring countries. They are the
most numerous indigenous people of the Russian Federation (more than 80% of the
population, according to the census of 2010 ), and the most
numerous people in Europe.
